metadata.description: Welcome to Red Light Properties, South Florida's #1 source for previously-haunted homes! A family-owned business operated by Jude and Cecilia Tobin, Red Light Properties cleans houses of all manner of lingering spirits and psychic disturbances, guaranteeing you a green light-certified home at prices way below market value! If you own a home with bad vibes that you're stuck with, or you're just looking for a great deal... give us a call today! Hablamos español.
metadata.name: Red Light Properties
